content.prompt: The rise in manufacturing beginning in the early 1800s eventually resulted in which of the following by 1848?

choices.label: The emergence of a larger middle class in the North
A decline in economic inequality in urban areas
An increased demand for agricultural workers in the Midwest
The improvement of working conditions in factories

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
